subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Atlético, a team that has a payroll of almost $90 million less than the other three teams remaining in the Champions League tournament, is one game from a place in the final.
snippet: Atlético, a team that has a payroll of almost $90 million less than the other three teams remaining in the Champions League tournament, is one game from a place in the final.
